testcase.name: As a user I create a new PET
testcase.system-out: Given I create a new PET with name 'dog' and type 'hound' and age 3.........passed Then I check if the PET with name 'dog' has been added into the list of Pets.passed

testcase.name: As a user I create a new PET and modify its age
testcase.system-out: Given I create a new PET with name 'dog1' and type 'hound1' and age 3.......passed Then I check if the PET with name 'dog1' has been added into the list of Pets.passed When Update the PET 'dog1' with age 4.......................................passed Then validate if the PET with name 'dog' has its age updated to 4...........passed
